title: Building A Business Around A Sports Passion With Colt Schroeder
itunes:title: Building A Business Around A Sports Passion With Colt Schroeder
description:
That thing you’re passionate about can be a business. As long as you can bring a love for the topic, a greater mission, and a commitment to doing the work to the table, the hobby you’re 110% all-in for is exactly the right thing to help you make your impact.

Colt Schroeder is the host of the Buffalo Nerd Sports Podcast and a lifelong, die-hard fan of the Buffalo Bills. His show exists to engage with his fellow Bills fans, share some team history, and highlight a different charity each week that’s doing some good in its community.

On this episode of Underdog Empowerment, Zach and Colt jam on motivating yourself to break out of the script and do what fires you up every morning, the exciting changes the Buffalo Bills are making that spell a new future for the team, and what you can expect when you tune into the podcast. Listen in for some sports insight and lessons in pure drive from someone who’s committed to betting on himself.

Show Notes: https://underdogempowerment.com/colt-schroeder
 
Get More Involved: 
 
  1. Leave A Review & Subscribe On iTunes: https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/underdog-empowerment/id1373572178
  2. Free A-to-Z roadmap on launching a top-shelf podcast: https://underdogempowerment.com/roadmap
  3. Access Our Top Resource Recommendations: https://underdogempowerment.com/resources/
  4. Subscribe On YouTube: https://underdogempowerment.com/youtube
